item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description:
https://steemit.com/news/@francesleader/4fatwy-war-and-no-peace-in-the-21st-century
WAR AND NO PEACE IN THE 21st CENTURY! francesleader (54) in news • last year PENTAGON'S CORE VS GAP MAP.jpg
The Pentagon's New Map: War and Peace in the Twenty-First Century is a 2004 book by Thomas P.M. Barnett based around an earlier article he wrote for Esquire magazine. It outlines a new grand strategy for American foreign policy. It is an iteration of a PowerPoint presentation that Barnett has been making for years that is known simply as "The Brief." Interested parties include the public and private sectors, encompassing military organizations and foreign governments.
item.content:encoded:
https://steemit.com/news/@francesleader/4fatwy-war-and-no-peace-in-the-21st-century

WAR AND NO PEACE IN THE 21st CENTURY!
francesleader (54) in news • last year
PENTAGON’S CORE VS GAP MAP.jpg

The Pentagon’s New Map: War and Peace in the Twenty-First Century is a 2004 book by Thomas P.M. Barnett based around an earlier article he wrote for Esquire magazine. It outlines a new grand strategy for American foreign policy. It is an iteration of a PowerPoint presentation that Barnett has been making for years that is known simply as “The Brief.” Interested parties include the public and private sectors, encompassing military organizations and foreign governments.

item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description:
https://steemit.com/geopolitics/@francesleader/this-binary-world-the-gap-core-reality
THIS BINARY WORLD - The GAP + CORE reality francesleader (54) in geopolitics • 4 months ago
The New World Order is a real thing. It is alive and kicking our arses.
It ignores international law and it ignores countries. From the point of view of its leaders we live in two zones: the GAP and the CORE.
item.content:encoded:
https://steemit.com/geopolitics/@francesleader/this-binary-world-the-gap-core-reality

THIS BINARY WORLD – The GAP + CORE reality
francesleader (54) in geopolitics • 4 months ago

The New World Order is a real thing.
It is alive and kicking our arses.

It ignores international law and it ignores countries.
From the point of view of its leaders we live in two zones: the GAP and the CORE.
